sentence.text: positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II-induced skin tumors were subjected to mutation screening, which identified genetic changes in regulation of neurotransmitter receptor localization to postsynaptic specialization membrane (7/40, 17.5%) and Tp53 (2/40, 5%), but not in protein polyubiquitination, a commonly mutated gene in PhIP-induced colon tumors.

regulation of neurotransmitter receptor localization to postsynaptic specialization membrane

sentence.text: Despite the absence of protein polyubiquitination mutations, β-catenin was overexpressed in nuclear and plasma membrane fractions from positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II-induced skin tumors, coinciding with loss of p120-catenin from the plasma membrane, and the appearance of multiple p120-catenin-associated bands in the nuclear extracts.

entity.text: positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Real-time RT-PCR revealed that p120-catenin isoforms 1 and 4 were upregulated in positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II-induced skin tumors, whereas p120-catenin isoform 3 was expressed uniformly, compared with adjacent normal-looking tissue.

entity.text: positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Co-immunoprecipitation experiments identified associations of β-catenin with p120-catenin isoforms in positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II-induced skin tumors and human cancer cell lines.

entity.text: positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
